Tulsa.Hurricane Soccer & Track Stadium:
Hurricane Soccer & Track Stadium is a stadium in Tulsa, Oklahoma on the campus of the University of Tulsa.
The stadium has seating for 2,000, plus standing room if needed. It is home to the Golden Hurricane track and field and soccer teams.
On Wednesday, May 20, 2015 the Tulsa Roughnecks hosted the Seacoast United Phantoms in the second round of the Lamar Hunt U.S. Open Cup.
